forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 67F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 21C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 71F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 67F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 68F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 21C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High near 70F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
